sentences.en: As for Passepartout, he was a Parisian of Paris.
sentences.cn: 至于路路通, 他可是个地道的巴黎人.

sentences.en: As for Passepartout, he was a true Parisian of Paris.
sentences.cn: 路路通丝毫不是福龙丹 、 马斯加里勒那一流的人.

sentences.en: Besides music, Viennese coffee and confection are as famous as Parisian's.
sentences.cn: 除了音乐, 维也纳的咖啡甜点和巴黎的可谓是不分上下.

sentences.en: CHARLES: You were eating all that good Parisian food.
sentences.cn: 查尔斯: 你肯定吃遍了巴黎所有的美食.

sentences.en: For months Malcolm had wanted to visit the Parisian art museums.
sentences.cn: 几个月来马尔科姆一直想参观巴黎的艺术博物馆。

sentences.en: He is a Parisian born and bred.
He pronounced them to perfection with genuine Parisian chic.
sentences.cn: 他念音非常准确,是纯粹的巴黎调子.

sentences.en: He seems the only one to really understand the Parisian mentality, the importance of architecture and politics, grandeur and charm, poetry and citizenship.
sentences.cn: 他似乎是唯一一个真正了解巴黎精神、结构和政治重要性、城市庄严与魅力、诗情画意和公民权的人。

sentences.en: His images often depict local residents, including this piece, which was part of a 2004 Parisian project called "Portrait of a Generation".
sentences.cn: 他的图像通常描写当地居民，其中包括这一幅，是2004年巴黎“一代人肖像”项目的组成部分。

sentences.en: Opera and drama have been deeply rooted in Parisian lives.
sentences.cn: 歌剧与戏剧艺术已深深地植根于法国人民的生活中.

sentences.en: Parisian lined the streets to admire the young couple.
sentences.cn: 巴黎市民站在街道两旁赞赏这对年轻夫妇.

sentences.en: She bought a dress patterned upon a Parisian model.
sentences.cn: 她买了一件仿照巴黎流行式样而做的衣服.

sentences.en: Strike up a conversation a Parisian.
sentences.cn: 找唯一巴黎人展开一段对话,但这也不太简易.

sentences.en: The tart was so Parisian, I knew it would be a great candidate for our Paris issue—and, of course, people always love chocolate.
sentences.cn: 这只馅饼实在是太巴黎了，我知道它一定将是这期巴黎特刊的最佳候选----并且，当然啦，人们永远都爱吃巧克力。

sentences.en: These mysteries were solved by the fiercely intelligent Parisian , Auguste Dupin.
sentences.cn: 这些神秘的事件全被才智出众的奥古斯特?杜平破解了.

sentences.en: This is a bottle of Parisian perfume.
This is Miss Ida from the Parisian Restaurant.
sentences.cn: 我是巴黎人餐要的艾达小姐.

sentences.en: Vignoles is a construction on an entire Parisian housing block.
sentences.cn: Vignoles是建设对整个巴黎住房块.

trans.tran_en: someone from the city of Paris in France
